GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/article_id.description: serves an object of selected article by ID

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for a given id

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all topics

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment to the given article when passed a username and body

exampleResponse.body: I have no idea what is going on anymore

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: will update the vote count given an amount to increase

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: will DELETE a comment when passed a comment_id
